mediaType.description: The type of media being uploaded. Choose one from the specified options.

title.description: The title of the media item. Fill this out only if you are 100% sure of its relevance.

slug.description: An optimized URL slug for the media item. Should be concise and relevant. Provide this only when certain.

description.description: A detailed description of the media. Include this only if you confidently know how it fits the content.

altText.description: Alternative text for accessibility and SEO purposes. This should describe the media accurately.

caption.description: A brief caption or comment about the media, pertinent to its context. Only include if relevant.

filename.description: The name of the media file, including its extension (e.g., .jpg, .mp4). Confirm its accuracy before submitting.

keywords.description: A list of relevant keywords related to the media for SEO purposes. Ensure these accurately represent the content.

metaDescription.description: A concise meta description summarizing the media content. Fill this out only if the information is clear and verified.

headline.description: The headline associated with the media for schema markup. Ensure it accurately reflects the content.

description.description: A brief description for schema markup, providing context about the media item. Fill only if you are sure about its relevance.
